name: BDSM Sex - Episode 1
description:
A visual novel series about a young woman curious about BDSM. In this episode, she meets her Master for the first time.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Katy, a gorgeous woman in her early twenties, had always been curious about the world of BDSM.
The idea of surrendering control and exploring her deepest desires had captivated her mind for months.
Finally, after much contemplation, she had made her decision to attend her first session.
As she walked into the dungeon, her heart raced with excitement and nervousness.

Immerse yourself in her fantasy and follow her kinky journey as a submissive.
We promise a story with arousing dialogues, realistic-looking characters, and high-definition graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
